resources.string: There are currently no currencies added to the dashboard.\n\nClick on the \"+\" button at the top to add some.
You can only add up to fifteen currencies to the dashboard.
Taking too long to connect to the Internet. Try again later.
There are no currencies available to remove from the dashboard.
You need to be connected to the Internet to run the conversion.
You need to be connected to the Internet to update the Dashboard.
Please add some currencies to the Dashboard.
successfully added to dashboard. Refresh the dashboard to see the exchange rate.
already exist. Please select another currency.
